LanguageData.RCNamePlayerFactionMessage: {0} thinks that the faction could use a fresh new name. What should it be?
LanguageData.RCPlayerFactionBaseNameIsInvalid: That community name is invalid, sorry bud.
LanguageData.RCNamePlayerFactionBaseMessage_NameFacti: Since you're at it, {0} also thinks that you should give this community a new name if you want to.
